page.title: 07 CONTINUING TO LEARN
page.content: In the district of Dalmilling and Whitletts, there are three primary schools. {St. Catherine's R.C.Primary. {**************************** { }Built in 1957, this single stream school has 105 pupils and 8 members of staff, including the head teacher.The children who attend this school are of the Catholic Religion. {Dalmilling Primary School. {************************** 200 metres away from St.Catherine's is Dalmilling Primary School,built in 1960. This is the largest primary in the area, with 380 pupils and 18 full time members of staff, includiing the head teacher.There are also visiting teachers for Music,Piping / Drumming, Brass Instruments,Physical Education and Homecraft.
